Keywords: Future , Past , Robot
Real Name: Unknown
Special Powers
PROTECTING THE SACRED TIMELINE: FREE: Choose an opposing character within range and line of fire. Gain 1 MISSION POINT for each other character on the map with the same name as the chosen character.
HEY Y'ALL!: FREE: Place Miss Minutes in a square within range that is adjacent to blocking terrain.
THAT IS NOT NICE, JERK!: STOP. Regeneration, Super Senses.

A Potential Abuse of Mission Points (500 pts)
Post Comment
Comments
July 17, 2022
efiscrow
Played a game with Miss Minutes, Ares (WW80), Photon (AI Chase) & 7 Allied Soldiers = 390 points. Game was over in 3 turns. Miss Minutes with Ares is just a broken combination. No attack rolls required. You just need that initial 4-6 Leadership roll from Ares, then you generate an Allied soldier on the opponents' force, then use Photon to place it next to Photon and within Range and LOS of Miss Minutes.
June 13, 2022
Oathful
As an avid collector of Robots, this figure is a great support/harasser for your team. Despite Incapacitate losing its damage from extra tokens, the ability to lock people down for a turn (assuming they don't have/make their leadership/willpower) is still a very nice ability. Pair her with some cheap Barrier and she can appear anywhere on the map you want OR make a clean getaway. That full dial of Prob and Super Senses as well as a STOP click really just make her a nuisance to deal with. Don't expect much out of here Plot Points though. Thematic: 9/10 Viability: 8/10 Fun Factor: 9/10, fairly balanced figure
June 1, 2022
Bobcat2022
You're not going to get anything out of her Mission Points unless you build for it - Robot's a decent keyword for that, but one wishes she had Scientist or maybe Cosmic. She's great in Sealed, though, and in just about any other use you put her to. Prob, high mobility (on the right map she's absolutely deadly), and the Senses/STOP making her much harder to KO than most in her point range. The pretty-darn-good Incap is gravy. Oh, and despite her sculpt being at least an average volume of plastic, she does have Tiny Size - don't forget the defense-boost-at-range and the carried-by-standard-boot-symbol that she gets from that.
May 4, 2022
Goop
Cheap prob, great defense, great mobility, can incap with 12atk and a STOP click too. Love this piece, too bad keywords are very limited.
April 20, 2022
RockyRaccoon
She will be a bit of an Achilles heel for Loki or swarm teams. 12 Attack, a stop click, a way to teleport around the map, SS and Prob con to boot. This is an insane rare for only 35 points.
